# STATS::STAT_SET_BOOL

## Summary
Set the value of an boolean stat.

## Parameters
* **STATSENUM** keyHash
* **BOOL** data
* **BOOL** coderAssert = true

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Example:
 STATS::STAT_SET_BOOL(MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("MPPLY_MELEECHLENGECOMPLETED"), trur, true);
